overview: Led by Woody, Andy's toys live happily in his room until Andy's birthday brings Buzz Lightyear onscene. Afraid losing his place in Andy's heart, Woody plots against Buzz. But when circumstances separate Buzz and Woody from their owner, duo eventually learns put aside their differences.

Andy heads off Cowboy Camp, leaving his toys their own devices. Things shift inhigh gear when an obsessive toy collector named Al McWhiggen, owner Al's Toy Barn kidnaps Woody. Andy's toys mount daring rescue mission, Buzz Lightyear meets his match and Woody has decide where he and his heart truly belong.

When child accidentally enters their world, James and Mike suddenly find that kids are not be afraid and they uncover conspiracy that could threaten all children across world.

It's up his worrisome father Marlin and friendly but forgetful fish Dory bring Nemo home -- meeting vegetarian sharks, surfer dude turtles, hypnotic jellyfish, hungry seagulls, and more along way.

baby lamp finds ball play with and it's all fun and games until ball bursts. Just when elder Luxo thinks his kid will settle down for bit, Luxo Jr. finds ball ten times bigger.

rat named Remy dreams becoming great French chef despite his family's wishes and obvious problem being rat in decidedly rodent-phobic profession. WALL·E is last robot left on an Earth that has been overrun with garbage and all humans have fled outer space. For 700 years he has continued try and clean up mess, but has developed some rather interesting human-like qualities. When ship arrives with sleek new type robot, WALL·E thinks he's finally found friend and stows away on ship when it leaves.

Carl Fredricksen spent his entire life dreaming exploring globe and experiencing life its fullest. But at age 78, life seems have passed him by, until twist fate (and persistent 8-year old Wilderness Explorer named Russell) gives him new lease on life.

Everyone knows that stork delivers babies, but where do storks get babies from? answer lies up in stratosphere, where cloud people sculpt babies from clouds and bring them life. Gus, lonely and insecure grey cloud, is master at creating "dangerous" babies. Crocodiles, porcupines, rams and more - Gus's beloved creations are works art, but more than handful for his loyal delivery stork partner, Peck. As Gus's creations become more and more rambunctious, Peck's job gets harder and harder. How will Peck manage handle both his hazardous cargo and his friend's fiery temperament?

Woody, Buzz, and rest Andy's toys haven't been played with in years. With Andy about go college, gang find themselves accidentally left at nefarious day care center. toys must band together escape and return home Andy.

What lengths will robot undergo do his job? BURN·E is dedicated hard working robot who finds himself locked out his ship. BURN·E quickly learns that completing simple task can often be very difficult endeavor.

Mike discovers that being top-ranking laugh collector at Monsters, Inc. has it's benefits - in particular, earning enough money buy six-wheel-drive car that's loaded with gadgets. That new-car smell doesn't last long enough, however, as Sulley jump-starts an ill-fated road test that teaches Mike true meaning buyer's remorse.

When an overconfident teen alien gets behind controls spaceship, he must attempt abduct slumbering farmer under watchful eye critical instructor. But abducting humans requires precision and gentle touch, and within few missteps it's painfully clear why more humans don't go missing every year.

An unruly daughter and an accomplished archer, Méridone day defies sacred custom land and inadvertently brings turmoil kingdom. In an attempt set things right, Méridseeks out an eccentric old Wise Woman and is granted an ill-fated wish. Also figuring inMérida’s quest — and serving as comic relief — are kingdom’s three lords: enormous Lord MacGuffin, surly Lord Macintosh, and disagreeable Lord Dingwall.

Dignity. Poise. Mystery. We expect nothing less from great turn-of-the-century magician, Presto. But when Presneglects feed his rabbit one too many times, magician finds he isn't only one with few tricks up his sleeve!

An aging codger named Geri plays daylong game chess in park against himself. Somehow, he begins losing his livelier opponent. But just when game's nearly over, Geri manages turn tables.

look at relationship between Mike and Sulley during their days at Monsters University — when they weren't necessarily best friends.

What starts out as fun road trip for Toy Story gang takes an unexpected turn for worse when trip detours roadside motel. After one toys goes missing, others find themselves caught up in mysterious sequence events that must be solved before they all suffer same fate in this Toy Story Terror.

young boy comes age in most peculiar circumstances. Tonight is very first time his Papand Grandpare taking him work. Should he follow example his Papa, or his Grandpa? Will he be able find his own way in midst their conflicting opinions and timeworn traditions?

Growing up can be bumpy road, and it's no exception for Riley, who is uprooted from her Midwest life when her father starts new job in San Francisco. Like all us, Riley is guided by her emotions - Joy, Fear, Anger, Disgust and Sadness. emotions live in Headquarters, control center inside Riley's mind, where they help advise her through everyday life. As Riley and her emotions struggle adjust new life in San Francisco, turmoil ensues in Headquarters. Although Joy, Riley's main and most important emotion, tries keep things positive, emotions conflict on how best navigate new city, house and school.

story follows love story two volcanoes, Uku and Lele. It features song, "Lava", which is written by Murphy and performed by KuanTorres Kahele and NapuGreig, who voice two volcanoes.
